Title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority conduct a study on Brooklyn College constructing a micro-grid
Summary: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority conduct a study on Brooklyn College constructing a micro-grid to study the feasibility, efficiency, and energy saving costs if such a micro-grid was constructed on campus.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York state energy research and development authority study feasibility and efficiency of a micro-grid in relation to reducing the carbon footprint of Brooklyn College
